item.description:
Price: $105.00 per person (no refunds)

How to find us: Meetup outside the Club House

What: Golf Lessons - 6 Tuesdays

When: Tuesday, May 10, 2011 @ 6:30 PM (instruction will begin @ 6:30)

Cost: $105 per person (5 wkly lessons & wk 6 live play) - unbelievable price!!

Where:

Rockland Golf Course
276 Plain Street
Rockland, MA 02370
781-878-5836

Who: No Guests for this meet-up as demand is high and space is limited


Hello Everyone -

Hard to believe another year has past but I'm excited to announce our 2011 Golf Lessons are back. Last year we had a great turnout, learned a lot and had great fun!! If you're new to the lessons this year - great! If you're joining us again - even better! Everyone is Welcome!!!  Since we maxed out our participation last year, you may want to sign up quickly as space is limited.

We had such a great experience last year, I've decided to revisit the Rockland Golf Course again for our 2011 lessons.  After working out the plans with the course, they've agreed not to increase the price this year.   Hurray for us!!  So this year we're going to have 3 dedicated Golf Pro's instruct us whereby the group will be split into skill levels and instructed accordingly.  Each week we'll rotate between instructors with instruction from each at a Beginner to Intermediate level.

  • Tentative Lesson Plan:
    • Week #1 - Putting, Chipping, Grip
    • Week #2 - Pitching, short game
    • Week #3 - Working with Irons
    • Week #4 - Woods, driving, T off
    • Week #5 - Live play on the course with instruction
    • Week #6 - Live play with group discounted greeens fee ($5's included)

PAYMENT:

In order to be included you must commit to the 6 weeks.  There are NO refunds and payment is expected up front.  Upon your "Yes" RSVP, I will email you my address so you can mail your $100 check payable to me

NOTE:

  • If you RSVP to the clinic you are committing to the entire 6 weeks of classes or $105’s
  • If you know before the clinic begins of a week you need to miss - let me know and you won't be charged for that week
  • If you have an absence during the clinic that wasn't determined before hand, unfortunately, I cannot refund for the week missed
  • Plan to arrive a few minutes early to get organized and into our groups as the lesson will begin promptly at 6:30 pm
  • Golf clubs and balls will be supplied to any member if needed at no charge 
  • SSFMG and its organizers are not responsible for any injuries to participants or damage to equipment.


Organizers: Susan (AO)

The Final Deadline is Noon, Tuesday, May 3rd for RSVP & Payment. Please be mindful if you change your RSVP to NO at the last minute as you may be taking a spot away from someone else that is serious about participating.

Weather Alternative:

None. This event will be canceled if it is raining or too foggy. We will do our best to cancel that afternoon or the night before. So check your email if the weather seems questionable. However, we cannot control Mother Nature so we will do our best to notify everyone at least 3 hours prior to the event. Please do not assume a cancellation unless you recieve an email saying so.

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

Directions:
item.why: Spend time outdoors, exercise, meet new people and have a great time!!

group.name: The South Shore Fitness Meetup Group

item.name: 2011 Golf Lessons
